author: Jacob Kastrenakes
title: Vanlife hits a standstill during the pandemic
description: With borders closing, YouTube and Instagram vanlife influencers have pulled off the road during the COVID-19 pandemic. Living in a van means less space to store food, struggles with finding places to shower, and potential income problems when you don’t have g…
content:
Self-quarantining is tough try doing it in a van
Photo: The Indie Projects
Theo Gove-Humphries and Bee Roper had their next two years planned out. They would fly with their van, naturally from the UK to Canada. Theyd make their way across North America, dip… [+8067 chars]
